div.p: The Scalar Guides are your go to source for getting started with Scalar.
This guide will help you get started with the Scalar Registry for managing and versioning OpenAPI Documents as a source of truth.
div.b: Get your API on the registry →

div.p: This guide will help you get started with the Scalar Docs, literally in minutes.
div.b: Learn how to document your API →

div.p: This guide will help you get started with generating world-class SDKs in TypeScript, Python, Golang and more powered by Speakeasy.
div.b: Start generating SDKs from your API →
